title: Integrative Medicine: Healing the Whole Person | Resource | Baptist Health South Florida
cleaned_text: 10, 2021 Healing involves more than undergoing a medical procedure or taking a pill. Increasingly, healthcare systems such as [Baptist Health South Florida ](https://nam10.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbaptisthealth.net%2Fen&data=04%7C01%7CJohnFer%40baptisthealth.net%7C0baf7b33c2cc4ce6402c08d95bff3c86%7C3783f79319c8492899c48d1861e6cc1f%7C0%7C0%7C637641974054846161%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=YfVbF1ckGPFMcGL2ty7AL0gOf3CSPhbLPhDXY3mJXzw%3D&reserved=0)are offering integrative therapies, including acupuncture, meditation, healthy foods, art therapy and pet therapy, to meet the physical, emotional and spiritual needs of their patients. In this episode, host [Jonathan Fialkow, M.D.](https://nam10.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdoctors.baptisthealth.net%2Fprovider%2FJonathan%2BAdam%2BFialkow%2F868521%3Funified%3Dfialkow%26sort%3Dnetworks%252Crelevance&data=04%7C01%7CJohnFer%40baptisthealth.net%7C0baf7b33c2cc4ce6402c08d95bff3c86%7C3783f79319c8492899c48d1861e6cc1f%7C0%7C0%7C637641974054846161%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=o0N7FxONC%2Fz4%2B66%2BtWCPv4oACXsYv60g3NrpjMxOKCY%3D&reserved=0), explores the impacts integrative medicine can bring to patients' well being with expert guests from across Baptist Health: · [Beatriz Currier, M.D,](https://nam10.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdoctors.baptisthealth.net%2Fprovider%2FMaria%2BBeatriz%2BCurrier%2F869586%3Fname%3DMaria%2520Beatriz%2520Currier%26sort%3Dnetworks%252Crelevance&data=04%7C01%7CJohnFer%40baptisthealth.net%7C0baf7b33c2cc4ce6402c08d95bff3c86%7C3783f79319c8492899c48d1861e6cc1f%7C0%7C0%7C637641974054856156%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=j9%2BnVlrcGB7VbLpbtjzap2AmcOBdEoOcDBovTwmBPeA%3D&reserved=0) medical director of the [Cancer Patient Support Center](https://nam10.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcancer.baptisthealth.net%2Fmiami-cancer-institute%2Fpatient-support&data=04%7C01%7CJohnFer%40baptisthealth.net%7C0baf7b33c2cc4ce6402c08d95bff3c86%7C3783f79319c8492899c48d1861e6cc1f%7C0%7C0%7C637641974054856156%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=DJeyKaVzAxsgbMLsIQCTUsBKUvAoiscNv01iuW5UQyk%3D&reserved=0) at [Miami Cancer East.](https://nam10.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbaptisthealth.net%2Flocations%2Fhospitals%2Fbethesda-hospital-east&data=04%7C01%7CJohnFer%40baptisthealth.net%7C0baf7b33c2cc4ce6402c08d95bff3c86%7C3783f79319c8492899c48d1861e6cc1f%7C0%7C0%7C637641974055066029%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=K0Fq9OTnhyq5vBUpLlIW%2Bc3cunBh%2BD8ExgNCkc%2Bpk6M%3D&reserved=0) program](https://nam10.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbaptisthealth.net%2Fbaptist-health-news%2Fnew-program-at-miami-cancer-institute-gives-new-meaning-to-the-healing-arts%2F&data=04%7C01%7CJohnFer%40baptisthealth.net%7C0baf7b33c2cc4ce6402c08d95bff3c86%7C3783f79319c8492899c48d1861e6cc1f%7C0%7C0%7C637641974055076025%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=YmUY0nBgmmuIJgm0yeqfjZOEd2BqA5zVXtjxvyxZtfI%3D&reserved=0) and the [Grow2Heal](https://nam10.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbaptisthealth.net%2Fbaptist-health-news%2Fgrow2heal-homestead-hospitals-community-garden%2F&data=04%7C01%7CJohnFer%40baptisthealth.net%7C0baf7b33c2cc4ce6402c08d95bff3c86%7C3783f79319c8492899c48d1861e6cc1f%7C0%7C0%7C637641974055086020%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=V5nRCUGLxX7Pz3Xgj7O5k5JNrSDpMxX%2BqIWQa%2Fj86X8%3D&reserved=0) initiative.
